level.heading: Dual capacity.
level.text: A person may have a patron member's interest and an investor member's interest. When such person acts as a patron member, the person shall be subject to this chapter and the organic rules governing patron members. When such person acts as an investor member, the person shall be subject to this chapter and the organic rules governing investor members.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 116 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
